tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I moved to Dr. Arjun from Motherhood for vaccinations for my little baby girl. A very happy mom today writing this review! The clinic is very well maintained, hygienic and disinfected well during covid time. First impression- Dr. Arjun has always kept up time, a sigh of relief for me as a customer whenever appointments and time are respected in our country, he is very friendly and patient, takes time to justify and explain his advices, responds quickly on WhatsApp, approachable and level headed. A good doctor understand the emotions of a new mom and the baby and Dr. Arjun gets a thumbs up from me on this regard.
I never judge a book by its cover and never judge too quickly, I took my time to analyse their service, waited for few experiences before giving my genuine review after three appointments and I WALKED OUT AS A VERY HAPPY MOM today after my little 6 months baby Manya got vaccinated by Dr. Arjun. She didn‚Äôt cry at all, I asked the doctor twice if he finished cause I couldn‚Äôt believe it.
I have been working for a long time now, a good review doesn‚Äôt come easily from a customer unless a good job has been done and I can tell when a person is passionate about his/her job, Dr. Arjun is certainly one of them!

Hope future vaccinations continue to be as smooth and good as it was today, a good doctor for my baby is a mom‚Äôs best gift. Keeping my hopes high on Dr. Arjun and I am sure he won‚Äôt let me down. I feel my little baby is in safe hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Arjun ** *** ** *** **** ************* ** ********* ** *** ** ******* * *********** **** *** ******** ********* ***** *** ******* *** has a vast experience in examining the kids, their behaviour and in understanding ailments & treating them.  

He gives sufficient time to each patient and explains the process in details without hurrying up like a few other doctors do.
He‚Äôs polite, friendly and a very good human. 

Dr. Arjun has always been helpful in needs of emergency over email and phone and tries to solve the problem as much as he can.

Dr. Arjun was treating my son when he was born followed by a few months before he moved out of that particular hospital, and I couldn‚Äôt get his new location for a long time.
Than I experimented with a few doctors before finally getting Dr. Arjun‚Äôs contact and that happened to be around 15 kms away and it takes 1 hour+ drive from my place, but no regret travelling so far as Hopeberry Clinic is designed like a children‚Äôs play area and my son enjoys playing there as doesn‚Äôt get that regular clinic feel, hence the vaccinations become an easy task.

review:
The doctor just checked my son who was running very high fever for a quick 2 mins and said he might have either viral or bacterial *** * **** ** ******* *** ********* 
He didn‚Äôt even touch my son and didn‚Äôt check his vitals.*** ****** ** ****** ***** **** **** *** ********** 
As usual he asked us to continue dolo and recommended to visit him two days after.

No respite to my son, I had to visit another doctor in the evening *** *** ****** ********* ****** ********* ***** ******* ********************* *** zero value.
reply_text:
Hello, hope the child is better now. 
It‚Äôs impossible to accept your words. None of the pediatrician will prescribe medication without touching and examining child. 
And after being trained for so many years, you assessing doctor as confused is really misleading. Kindly provide me the valid prescription for further discussion.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Arjun, is a very dedicated doctor, he diagnosed the problem correctly, we were thinking the fever and discomfort for my kid was due to viral infection, but doctor clearly indicated that it's a ear infection, very happy with his diagnosis, now my daughter is doing good and the ear infection is subsiding. We have been visiting Dr Arjun, since 2 years now and every time we have visited him, he has treated my daughter very diligently and provided the best care and suggestions. Thanks to Dr Arjun and we highly recommend him for all your peadiatric requirements and suggestions. He is one of the most efficient pediatrician and he doesn't load you with too many medicines and provide you the right suggestions timely. Thanks Doctor .

Best Regards,
Saanves Parents, Srikanth and Swetha.

review: I used to give powder milk along with mine to baby even though I wanted to exclusively breastfeed. I was misled by other doctors as baby 's weight was on little lower side. After consulting Dr Arjun SK, he listened patiently about what had happened till then with relevant questions and encouraged to exclusively breastfeed. It was matter of max 2 weeks time and I did not have to give supplement to baby at all. And my baby's weight also got very gud plus his discomfort reduced n we saw happy baby after stopping supplements. I am very thankful to doctor and I highly recommend him üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We have been going to Hopeberry Clinic for about 7 months now with Dr. Arjun as a primary doctor for our daughter. Dr. Arjun is extremely diligent and thorough when it comes to Pediatrics. He is very patient and at the same time very friendly who genuinely cares about his patients. He clearly explains things to us in terms that we can understand. We have always felt very confident in his care. He is also available for phone calls & WhatsApp in case of emergency which is very much necessary when we have become parents for the 1st time. The staff always follow up with us and call to remind us about our appointments. I do recommend Dr. Arjun if anyone is looking for a good Pediatrician.

Regards,
Anil

review: I am very very happy with Dr. Arjun and with his treatment. Doctor will explain the issue very clearly and patiently repeats if asked twice. Listens to us very patiently and does not rush to conclusion. Unnecessary he will not go for antibiotics. I went when my baby was 9 months and she had constipation. He made sure a senior surgeon checked, confirmed it was not by birth and now with the diet plan he suggested it‚Äôs all cured. Also he is so very flexible, understanding and co-operative by nature because my daughter kind of panics & pukes during vaccination. So he makes time for her and comes early to give her vaccination. He also does video and phone consultation. Too very, overall satisfied with the treatment and Doctor. If someone is looking for best Paediatrician for baby, without any doubt you can visit Dr. Arjun.
